about_the_game:
NSFW Gay Visual Novel Dating Sim!

Play Episode 1 Free on Steam!

Black Ops soldiers Wraith and Tide know they must count on each other to survive. Will their bond as battle-brothers evolve into something more? Monster Ops: Military Special Forces Hunting Rogue Monsters!

This is an open-ended series with no ending planned. It's like a TV show that will continue until it's canceled.

Tide's first mission with the team took a completely twisted turn, and squad-leader Wraith is demanding answers! What was that serum they were injected with meant to do? Because it seems to make the monsters sexually attracted to them!

Commander Jackson is as unpredictable and unaccountable as ever, but at least he's able to give the team a well-deserved break. That is...until a monster intruder shows up in desperate need. There's no doubt about it...the serum changed them in a profound way!

Tide and Wraith feel ever more alone, and know they have only each other to count on...even for their most intimate needs!

An on-going visual novel series with new 1 to 2 hour stand-alone game episodes coming out monthly!

content_descriptors.notes: Contains scenes of explicit sexual content.

legal_notice: Copyright 2025 Y Press Games. All Rights Reserved.
name: Monster Ops 2
reviews:
“This series is a legit masterpiece. I am literally thinking about it all day long waiting for the next part to come out. This is how all visual novels should be done. A long, winding story full of twists and turns, where you don't have the characters tell you about their pasts, but actually live it all with them in real time month after month. I'm actually speeding through the sex scenes just to find out what's going to happen next. It's not just one secret you're trying to figure out, but a whole web of intrigue. And the introduction of the villain who was right there under your nose my God, chefs kiss! I don't know if this was just trying to be a Ghost/Soap fan game in the beginning, but it became so much more in its own right. Let's have more long-form series! This is how you do visual novels right!”
Patreon Patron
